name: EXT_CAUSE_INJ_DX
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The EXT_CAUSE_INJ_DX table holds the diagnoses that document any accidents or other external causes for the patient's injury.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EXT_CAUSE_INJ_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds the qualifier identifying the code set for the external cause of injury diagnoses.

columns.name: EXT_CAUSE_INJ_DX
columns.description: This item holds the external cause of injury diagnoses for the claim.

columns.name: EXT_CAUSE_INJ_POA
columns.description: This item identifies if the external cause of injury diagnosis was present when the patient was admitted.
